description: Our Ascent is an incremental roguelite RPG with many layers of metaprogression.

Release.description:
# 0.1.0

## Compatible With 
- Archipelago v0.6.5
- Our Ascent vB.2.1

## Features
- Equipment and Augments can be acquired as items in the multiworld.
- Unique enemy and boss kills, and Equipment purchases can be sent as checks to the multiworld.
- Option to have a specified amount of random stories from the first five stories in the Glades.
- Goaling is to defeat Fairy Fillia or Fairy Zephyria in every story present in your multiworld.
- All equipment slots are unlocked immediately.
- The ability to lock and automatically spend skill points is granted immediately (though it looks wrong in most stories right now)
- Achievements, and therefore boss points and skill points, are disabled and unavailable. Augments simply are increased when they are received.
- Augments will not take effect until their vanilla prerequisites are met (for chapter 1, this is exclusively having one copy of the prerequisite augment(s))
- Checks will be saved when acquired while disconnected and sent when reconnecting.

## Known Bugs:
- Many equipment visual/clarity issues; namely that if you are sent items before you buy them, you will no longer be able to see how much they cost.
- Enemies that drop items will drop them whenever defeated until you are sent the item (or with accessories, all copies of the item). 
- Similarly, enemies that drop an item you already have will not show the popup in the game (but will still send the check).
- The enemy compendium will show loot still available to acquire incorrectly.
- An extra copy of the starting character will be randomized in the multiworld.
Release.title: Our Ascent Randomizer - 0.1.0
